doneCMA

Overview

This method is to be invoked once all components of a CMA have been requested. This will be used by RP Data to improve its research metrics and solution offering; it uses BSGv2â€™s doneCMA under property service.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes

Additional Information

For further reading regarding BSG Elements:

  • Method_doneCMA

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
id Property ID Yes

Sample Request { "op": "doneCMA", "uid": "TR01", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "id": "7007111" }

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "isDoneCMA": true } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error description" } }
